Name: Sexy Serial Killer
About the game: Your lonely dad has not dated for 3 years. You convince him to try a computer dating service. Unfortunately for him his date is actually a serial killer. Can you save your dad and escape with your life? Features: Atmospheric Environments - An eerie house is waiting for you to explore. Psychological Experience - Sexy Serial Killer has been designed to provide a psychological horror experience. Game-play - Intuitive mechanics and controls. Enemies - The killer will hinder your advance at almost every turn. You are the hunted, not the hunter. Audio - Features intense and immersive music and sounds. Nowhere is safe.
